passed_checks.check_name: Ensure S3 bucket has block public ACLS enabled
code_block:
# bridgecrew:skip=BC_AWS_S3_13: not log
      Type: AWS::S3::Bucket
      Properties:
        BucketName: ${self:service}-${self:provider.region}-${opt:stage, 'dev'}
        BucketEncryption:
          ServerSideEncryptionConfiguration:
            - ServerSideEncryptionByDefault:
                SSEAlgorithm: AES256
        PublicAccessBlockConfiguration:
          BlockPublicAcls: true
          BlockPublicPolicy: true
          IgnorePublicAcls: true
          RestrictPublicBuckets: true
        VersioningConfiguration:
          Status: Enabled
        LifecycleConfiguration:
          Rules:
            - ExpirationInDays: 7
              Id: Expire uploads
              Status: Enabled

code_block:
func1:
    description: A function.
    handler: handler.handler

passed_checks.check_name: Ensure no hard coded AWS access key and secret key exists in provider
code_block:
myFunc:
    name: myFunc
    tags:
      RESOURCE: lambda
      PUBLIC: false
    iamRoleStatements:
      - Effect: Allow
        Action:
          - "*"
        Resource:
          - "*"
    handler: Handler.handle
    timeout: 600
    memorySize: 320

passed_checks.check_name: Ensure IAM policies that allow full "*-*" administrative privileges are not created
code_block:
myFunc:
    environment:
      FUNC_NAME: "myfunc"
      AWS_ACCESS_KEY: "AKIAIOSFODNN7EXAMPLE"
      AWS_SECRET_KEY: "wJalrXUtnFEMI/K7MDENG/bPxRfiCYEXAMPLEKEY"
    name: myFunc
    tags:
      RESOURCE: lambda
      PUBLIC: false
    iamRoleStatements:
      - Effect: Allow
        Action:
          - "lambda:InvokeFunction"
        Resource:
          - "arn:aws:lambda:#{AWS::Region}:#{AWS::AccountId}:function:invokedLambda"
    handler: Handler.handle
    timeout: 600
    memorySize: 320

passed_checks.check_name: Ensure Encryption in transit is enabled for EFS volumes in ECS Task definitions
code_block:
FargateTask:
      Family: test
      Type: AWS::ECS::TaskDefinition
      Properties:
        RequiresCompatibilities:
          - FARGATE
        Memory: 12288  # 12GB
        Cpu: 2048  # 2vCPV
        NetworkMode: awsvpc
        ExecutionRoleArn: arn:aws:iam::1234:role/ecsTaskExecutionRole
        TaskRoleArn: arn:aws:iam::1234:role/ecsTaskExecutionRole
